price: Isaaniin dura ummanni Nuuh, Aadiifi Fir’awni abbaa shikaalaa tae (ergamaa isaanii) sobsiisaniiru.
arabic: كَذَّبَتۡ قَبۡلَهُمۡ قَوۡمُ نُوحٖ وَعَادٞ وَفِرۡعَوۡنُ ذُو ٱلۡأَوۡتَادِ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: kadhabat qablahum qawmu nūḥin waʿādun wafir'ʿawnu dhū al-awtādi
